mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ADMIN(adm_no, cate_no, adm_id, adm_pw, adm_name, adm_email, adm_tel, adm_date) VALUES(ADMIN_SEQ.nextval, #{cate_no}, #{adm_id}, #{adm_pw}, #{adm_name}, #{adm_email}, #{adm_tel}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT adm_no, cate_no, adm_id, adm_pw, adm_name, adm_email, adm_tel, adm_date, adm_grade FROM admin WHERE adm_id = #{adm_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO admin_log(adm_log_no, adm_no, adm_log_ip, adm_log_time) VALUES(ADMIN_LOG_SEQ.nextval, #{adm_no}, #{adm_log_ip}, TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS'))
mapper.select: SELECT l.adm_log_no, a.adm_no, a.adm_id, l.adm_log_ip, l.adm_log_time FROM admin_log l INNER JOIN admin a ON a.adm_no = l.adm_no ORDER BY l.adm_log_time

SELECT l.adm_log_no, a.adm_no, a.adm_id, l.adm_log_ip, l.adm_log_time FROM admin_log l INNER JOIN admin a ON a.adm_no = l.adm_no
AND LOWER(a.adm_id) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{word_id}) || '%'
AND l.adm_log_ip LIKE '%' || #{word_ip} || '%'
AND l.adm_log_time BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP(#{start_date} || ' 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_TIMESTAMP(#{end_date} || ' 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
ORDER BY l.adm_log_time
